channel.title: Amnesty 317
channel.description:
[font=Verdana][size=10pt][center]Amnesty 317[/center][/size][/font]
[center]Hi. i am razor owner an dev of Amnesty 317 here at amnesty we strive to be a friendly an helpful community we are grateful for good an negative criticism now you might be looking at this server an wondering "how is this diffrent from any other 317" WELL let me answer that for you we are an eco based server we have a ton of bosses with all kinds of loot :) we are currently working on another boss that will remain CLASSIFIED until finished but it will be way worth the wait so please join us an give it a try :) STAFF POSTIONS are open currently please dont ask for staff but be helpful towards the server with bug reports [/center]
[center][b][i]FOURMS[/i][/b] [url=http://amnesty317.boards.net/]http://amnesty317.boards.net/[/url][/center] [center][b][i]Client[/i][/b][/center] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/i010ibm3boka07u/Amnesty.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/i010ibm3boka07u/Amnesty.jar?dl=1[/url]
[center][b]HOME[/b][/center]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/05f253d82da5939f0820382f6dc64742.png[/img]
[center][b]Shops[/b][/center]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/7f67f4bfd42dd3d3319466da7bedad46.png[/img]

[center][b]Boss Teleports[/b][/center]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/02285b44e11bf2ef4f84c31dfb2bb407.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/7270ba735447261049e41e5076c865a4.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/dd38f22a9074932b5bd09addc988fe8e.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/c9324c3c7bcc4db996517e2e0b93d997.png[/img]
[center][b]Custom titles ::mytitles ::mytitles2[/b][/center]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/a485d6224f03fd213d71f563eb07f768.png[/img]

item.title: Amnesty 317
item.dc:creator: @oxiiigrim oxiiigrim
item.description:
@oxiiigrim wrote:

Fun server, constant updates and the staff has great communication with the players.

Read full topic

item.title: Amnesty 317
item.dc:creator: @AmnestyV2 AmnestyV2
item.description:
@AmnestyV2 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

The personal shops is a n ice touch. Other than that I don’t see anything that would attract me to play this. Goodluck anyway.

thanks for taking a look

item.title: Amnesty 317
item.dc:creator: @AmnestyV2 AmnestyV2
item.description:
@AmnestyV2 wrote:

Thanks for the feed back guys ! yes we are currently working on adding some more bosses maybe even some “raid” style bosses so please come join us an come check out our server if you have any suggestions be sure to post them on the forums Razor & kaleb

Read full topic

item.title: Amnesty 317
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

A very unique server with some great features with a very hard working owner and staff team. He has put a lot of time into this server and is still working hard to produce great high quality content for players! Come check it out! Only a few clicks away!

-Recent update: Dungeoneering
-Future updates : Custom Bosses

Read full topic

item.title: Amnesty 317
item.dc:creator: @CoolnessRSPS CoolnessRSPS
item.description:
@CoolnessRSPS wrote:

I’ve Downloaded and Played this server, and i honestly have to say its one of the more better more fluent servers i played, its got amazing structure and always updating to benefit the players, its a generally a fun server. and the staff? the staff is amazing. the owner can code a like a genius, and they’re all super helpful
10/10 definitely should join.

Read full topic
